page.title: 12Home Life (continued)
page.content: When you are upstairs you can see Tower Bridge from the window. The lady who lives next door to us is old. She is English and she is very kind to us because we don't make any noise. There is an adventure park in Christian Street where my brother fell off a rope and broke his hand, so we don't go there any more. We are lucky to live near the Highway because every year we can see the London Marathon. My teacher at mosque trusts me and my friend Koyar. He gives us up to 30 pounds to change into 10 pound notes. He sends me to the shop to get him something to eat or to the chemist to get medicine. On Friday I don't go to mosque so I play marbles. I've got 500 marbles.
